mapper.select: SELECT RU.USER_ID , RU.USER_NAME AS NAME , RU.LOGIN_ID , RU.PWD AS LOGIN_PW , RU.COMPANY_ID , RC.COMPANY_NAME , RU.WORKPLACE_ID , RW.WORKPLACE_NAME , RU.EMAIL , RU.ROLE_003_CD AS ROLECD , GET_COMM_NM('003', RU.ROLE_003_CD) AS ROLENAME , RU."position" AS POSINAME FROM RFT_USER RU JOIN RFT_COMPANY RC ON (RU.COMPANY_ID = RC.COMPANY_ID) JOIN RFT_WORKPLACE RW ON (RU.WORKPLACE_ID = RW.WORKPLACE_ID) WHERE RU.LOGIN_ID = #{loginId}
